main.name: Phuc Truong
main.description: I will be graduating in December 2022 with my Bachchelor Degree in Computer Science. My side preoccupations include making travel video and being a sale associates at Home Depot
main.bio: My areas of expertise consist of Mobile and Web Application Design using ReactJS and Flutter as well as Data Structure and Algorithm. I'm also familiar with back end technologies such as Postman, Springboots, SQL, etc

resume.skillmessage: I am well versed with the following skills

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work.title: Intern
work.description: Wrote a Python program to perform web-scraping function and collect forecast weather data to assist with storm water inspection. This program reduced the time needed to perform weather data collecting task from 30 minutes to 5 minutes daily. Assisted civil engineers with storm water assessment and various on-site inspections

work.title: App Developer
work.description: Build mobile application using Flutter framework and other third party APIs. Created applications that incorporate Google Map API and live location tracking to calculate time dilation constants
